name: X-Rhythm
description:
Let's play X-Rhythm

Thi is a Rhythm Game with notes coming frm left, right, up and down based on my music: X-Rose songs.

Break the Beats!

Try hitting all the beats in our songs. 

Simple beats will appear from any direction. To hit Double beats you'll have to click two keys at the same time.  This rhythm game will test your musical precision.

Too easy or too difficult?

There are up to 6 levels of difficulty, check how many stars each song has to know its difficulty

Each difficulty have its own mapping and velocity. Once you feel confident enough with your skills, try next difficult level!

Songs made by X-Rose

Youtube Chanel 

Spotify

Developed by:

Alex Martinez alias X-Rose 🥀

Install instructions
  1.  Extract all .zip
  2.  Execute "X-Rhythm.exe"
  3.  Enjoy it!
